column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The food was good and I didn't even have ramen. I meant to
column2: but wanted to try a few small things instead of one big. Kale/quinoa salad
column4: and tuna tacos. All we're very good but my favorite was the curry rice and the hot sauce was perfect. Neat environment
column5: my only feedback was I asked for the cold salad first and after 20 +minutes all the food came out at once. When you are starving...that's not good. My waitress was great though and very sweet. Cool place. 3 stars is for the slow food time mostly
column6: and the screaming child on one side and college kids being vulgar on the other.
